entry.def: Sultry weather is hot and damp.

entry.def: Someone who is sultry is attractive in a way that suggests hidden passion.

sentences.en: My mind travelled back to a hot sultry day in the little town.

sentences.en: The sultry weather in the tropics encourages tourists to lead an indolent life.
